subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Liberty’s Josh McDougal outdueled Oregon’s Galen Rupp in the final straightaway to win the men’s N.C.A.A. cross-country title in Terre Haute, Ind. Rupp and the top-ranked Ducks won their first championship since 1977. The Texas Tech junior Sally Kipyego secured a second consecutive women’s title and Stanford won its third women’s team title in a row.
